title: What are the best decentralized messenger? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks to the Facebook scandal, now we know why privacy is important and why do we need to switch to decentralized messaging apps :)) I'm using Zangi Safe Messenger as it works on a serverless and peer-to-peer concept and doesn’t store communication history. The app has been my companion for more than a year especially in critical situations (2G, crowded WiFi, etc....). Irrelevant to the internet connection quality, all my video and voice calls are uninterrupted, and I don’t miss even a word while talking. Besides, it consumes 6 times less data compared to other messengers. Highly recommend! Cheers!

e-Chat is a social network of a new generation that allows you to communicate with your loved ones and get to know new people. Share your life with e-Chat! Decentralization will become the future of the Internet development. Thanks to the decentralization of the system, you can achieve complete scalability without expanding and supporting the network and server infrastructure. The solution will also be free and resistant to attempts to closure and censorship.
